item.title: OnlyFans Gross Revenue Rises 9% to $7.2 Billion in 2024
item.description: Porn-friendly creator platform OnlyFans is still making money hand over fist — but its growth in 2024 cooled off compared to the torrid pace of prior years. In fiscal 2024, the company reported
